India needs to realise that war is in no oneтАЩs interest except Narendra Modi; whose escalating ego is reminiscent of dictators who started world wars.#SayNoToWar https://t.co/uNZZ40hXD0NEXT_TWEETThere is a new leadership in Pakistan today, that wants peace but will not bow down where itтАЩs sovereignty is concerned. Since taking power, PM Imran Khan has at multiple occasions reiterated the need for a dialogue and resolution. #SayNoToWar https://t.co/GPRA9HgyNVNEXT_TWEETтАЬTwo Nuclear-Armed countries cannot think of war. They should not even think of cold war because it can turn hot at any stage & you do not take a chance when two countries have nuclear bombsтАЭ PM Imran Khan has always been an ambassador of peace #SayNoToWar  #LetBetterSensePrevail https://t.co/z0dh2btDQbNEXT_TWEETEscalation of tensions between #India #Pakistan are very worrying. A reminder that underlying issues in #Kashmir must be addressed. 'Excessive use of state-led violence' and persistent human rights abuses under PM Modi have caused a growing insurgency in Kashmir. #SayNoToWar https://t.co/8kbLQhDbBRNEXT_TWEETWe extended an olive branch to India but alas the Indian govt resorted to unprovoked aggression. As a sovereign state we reserve the right to protect our land and our airspace. India must show maturity now to avoid a war with us.
